channel.title: Longjmp on Vishal Chovatiya
channel.description: Recent content in Longjmp on Vishal Chovatiya

item.title: Error Handling : setjmp & longjmp
item.description: Points To Catch As for the control flow: setjmp returns twice, and longjmp never returns. When you call setjmp for the first time, to store the environment, it returns zero, And then when you call longjmp, the control flow passes to return from setjmp with the value provided in the argument. Use cases are generally cited as “error handling”, and “don’t use these functions”. Note:Â setjmp needn’t actually be functions; it may well be a macro.
